detaileddescription.para: Internally called by DyscoStMan when creating a new column.

briefdescription.para: Set the dimensions of values in this column.
Get the dimensions of the values in a particular row.

detaileddescription.para: The rownr parameter is not used as the shape is the same for all rows.

briefdescription.para: Read the values for a particular row.

detaileddescription.para:
This will read the required data and decode it.
rowNr
The row number to get the values for.
dataPtr
The array of values, which should be a contiguous array.

briefdescription.para: Write values into a particular row.

detaileddescription.para:
This will add the values into the cache and returns immediately afterwards. A pool of threads will encode the items in the cache and write them to disk.
rowNr
The row number to write the values to.
dataPtr
The data pointer, which should be a contiguous array.

memberdef.argsstring: (DyscoDistribution distribution, Normalization normalization, double studentsTNu, double distributionTruncation) override
memberdef.name: Prepare

detaileddescription.para:
Should only be called by DyscoStMan.
bitsPerSymbol
New number of bits per symbol.

memberdef.argsstring: (size_t nRowsInBlock, size_t nAntennae) const final override
memberdef.name: CalculateBlockSize

briefdescription.para: Get number of bytes needed for column header of this column.

detaileddescription.para:
This is excluding the generic column header.
Size of column header

briefdescription.para: A column for storing compressed values in a threaded way, tailored for the data and weight columns that use a threaded approach for encoding.
